content.raw:
I believe this issue is also present on default. There are several issues exiting the Model Editor, for example issue #1326, and several issues in common between the Model Editor and the Building Editor.

I was talking to @spaepcke about doing for the Model Editor what's being made for the Building Editor on pull request #1312. Including substituting the whole menu bar on the top.
content.html:
I believe this issue is also present on default. There are several issues exiting the Model Editor, for example issue #1326, and several issues in common between the Model Editor and the Building Editor.

I was talking to @spaepcke about doing for the Model Editor what's being made for the Building Editor on pull request #1312. Including substituting the whole menu bar on the top.
